pullrequest.title: Explicitly set the cmake_minimum_required policy version for package config files

content.raw: The `CMAKE_*_VERSION` variables come from the version of cmake used to configure `ignition-cmake`, which won't necessarily match the value specified in [line 1 of the root CMakeLists.txt](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/981c6eda3e1f57379123f11e407cf4c2e8ac9d89/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-1). That feels messy to me. I'd prefer that the minimum required version that we export doesn't depend on the version of cmake used  during configuration
